title: BRIEF-Pivot Technology Solutions Announces Sale Of Smart Edge To Intel And Enters Into Preferred Partnership Agreement
text:
BRIEF-Pivot Technology Solutions Announces Sale Of Smart Edge To Intel And Enters Into Preferred Partnership Agreement

Stock Markets 12 minutes ago (Oct 15, 2019 07:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Pivot Technology Solutions Announces Sale Of Smart Edge To Intel And Enters Into Preferred Partnership Agreement Oct 15 (Reuters) - Pivot Technology Solutions Inc : * PRESS RELEASE - PIVOT TECHNOLOGY SOLUTIONS, INC. ANNOUNCES THE SALE OF SMART EDGE™ TO INTEL AND ENTERS INTO PREFERRED PARTNERSHIP AGREEMENT * PIVOT TECHNOLOGY SOLUTIONS - TO SELL SMART EDGE SOFTWARE BUSINESS TO INTEL FOR $27 MILLION, PAYABLE IN CASH

BRIEF-Pivot Technology Solutions Announces Sale Of Smart Edge To Intel And Enters Into Preferred Partnership Agreement
description: BRIEF-Pivot Technology Solutions Announces Sale Of Smart Edge To Intel And Enters Into Preferred Partnership Agreement
